response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's an exceptional opportunity tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its high value to you, I believe it would be a perfect fit for your endeavors. Considering its worth to both of us, I propose a price of $14,000 for this product. This offer allows you to secure an item valued at $15,000 for a competitive price, ensuring you receive the best value while also allowing me to maximize the return on my investment.
